goal.en: 1. to build the fundamental abilities of measurement and data analysis 2. to cultivate the abilities of logical deduction and report-writing 3. to experience the processes and methods about experimental verification
goal.ch: 1. 建立量測與數據處理的基本能力。 2. 培養邏輯推演與報告撰寫的能力。 3. 體驗實驗驗證的過程與方法。

content.en:
Class activities include Experiment and Discussion.
Syllabus:
1. Oscilloscope
2. Multimeter
2. RC Circuit
3. Magnetic Force and Electro-magnetic Induction
4. Michaelson Interference
5. Atomic Spectrum and Plank‘s constant
6. Optical Diffraction and Refraction
7. Polarization
content.ch:
課程內容含實驗操作與討論。
實驗項目：
1. 示波器
2. 三用電表
2. RC電路
3. 電磁力與電磁感應
4. 邁克森干涉
5. 原子光譜與蒲朗克常數
6. 光的繞涉與折射
7. 偏振光的特性

method.en: Lecture Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.en: 1. pre-class report: 25% 2. final report: 40% 3. Quiz: 10% 4. final exam: 20% 4. class attitude: 5%

flex_desc.en:
1. exended final exam
2. self learning education
flex_desc.ch:
1. 期末考必要之延長時間
2. 學生自主學習
